General.Name: Adira Dinamika Multi Finance
General.Description: PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk provides consumer financing, murabahah financing, and finance leasing services in Indonesia. It also provides sharia financing, which includes investment financing, working capital financing, multipurpose financing, and other financing business. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Adira Dinamika Multi Finance Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk.   PT Adira Finance operates as an auto finance firm. The company is based in Indonesia. PT Adira Finance operates as a subsidiary of PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk.
General.Address: Millennium Centennial Center Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12920
